channel.title: Collaboration on harry morley
channel.description: Recent content in Collaboration on harry morley

item.title: Inside Voice - Joey Dosik (Studio Cover)
item.description: Went to Air Studios, London and had the pleasure of playing a very old Hammond B3 and Minimoog, on a cover of Joey Dosik’s “Inside Voice”, alongside some talented friends. Psychedelic phone video edited by myself.

item.title: Take My Hand - Matt Berry (Studio Cover)
item.description: Played keys on this cover of the Toast of London theme tune with some wonderful people! Recorded and produced by Ashley Andrew-Jones and Paul Anders.
